title: Woloch on Colonial Women - Effect of Change

content.prompt: The shift in the English American colonies away from the class structure described in the first paragraph of the excerpt contributed most immediately to

choices.label: the growth of opposition to the institution of slavery
a widespread movement for colonial independence
the integration of Native Americans into colonial society
an increase in economic opportunity for White male migrants

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
